label: Description
value: Above, view of a hillside, showing isolated trees and a house in its lower part, a meadow flanked by woods in its upper part. On verso, horizontally, a wooded hillside. A boulder is shown in the right foreground.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, pen, brush and blue ink on paper; Verso: Graphite, pen, brown and black ink on paper

label: Provenance
value: Mrs. Samuel Colman; 1939: acquired by Museum

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle.  Obverse: A wood with a beech tree in the foreground on hilly ground.  Reverse, horizontally:  trees at the edge of the wood are shown at left, a hillside with a meadow and a group of trees in the background, at right.

label: Description
value: A double flanked sycamore growing on stony ground. Another tree is shown in the right middle distance.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, graphite, brush and watercolor on paper

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor wash on cream paper

label: Provenance
value: Mrs. Samuel Colman; 1939: acquired by Museum
Study of a Tree on a Hillside

label: Description
value: Study of a tree on a hillside. Thick trunk with dense, relatively short branches and bushy clumps of green leaves.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor, pen and brown ink, graphite on paper
Head of a Mule with a Bridle, Head of a Buffalo or Ox

label: Description
value: At left, head and neck of a bridled mule, turned toward right, At center, forepart of a buffalo, turned toward right and obliquely shown. A cord is fastened to the horns. Verso: A covered cart with two wheels, shown from the left back.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and gouache, graphite on dark grey-brown paper

label: Description
value: A brig sailing the Hudson, with hills and mountains in the rear.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor, gouache, graphite on paper
Steamers and Ships on a River

label: Description
value: Two steamers and many sail ships, some with red flags, anchored in a river. A hilly and mountainous landscape in the background. The rose grounding cover is visible, at top.

label: Description
value: View from a tree edged hill top across a valley at hills. Inscribed in graphite, above: "Old maple trees. Brandon Sept…(?) 1917". On verso, in opposite direction: two trees; caption inscribed in ink over graphite: "Sugar maples at Brandon, Vt".

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, blue crayon, pen and ink on paper; Verso: Pen and brown and black ink

label: Provenance
value: Mrs. Samuel Colman; 1939: acquired by Museum

label: Description
value: On recto and verso: a tree; captions: "Old maple tree on Broad St / Clarement N. H." and the date respectively in ink over graphite. "See other side" is written in graphite on either side. On verso, inscribed beside in graphite: "Sol…(?) Green yellow / inclining to chrome".

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and watercolor on paper

label: Provenance
value: Mrs. Samuel Colman; 1939: acquired by Museum

label: Description
value:
Recto: Vertical view of oaks, one standing behind the other at left and two more oaks at right.
Verso: An incomplete sketch of a dead tree at right edge.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Graphite, brush and watercolors on brown paper Verso: Graphite

label: Description
value: Man shown obliquely from the front, walking, wearing wooden shoes and a large hat. Red-brown coat with yellow sleeves, blue waistcoat, and brown trousers.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor, gouache, graphite on rough brown-grey paper
Sketches from Sea Girt, New Jersey

label: Description
value:
Recto: Top row, view from dunes toward the sea and far shore. Color notations written with pencil along left edge. Second row: A dwelling surrounded by trees shown in the middle distance. Third row: sky over the dunes and sea. Masts of ships shown in background. Inscribed with color notations. First row, left: a man with a net, standing in water. Horizontal lines are drawn beneath sketches. Place and date left. Bottom: a tree in the dunes, with color notations written beneath. 
Verso: At top, an old cedar growing in front of bushes and trees. At bottom of sheet, a bush, with place, name and date. At right, dunes with sea shown in left background.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite with watercolor wash on white wove paper Verso: Graphite, pen and ink

label: Description
value: At right, a walking steer turned toward right, with the head facing away from viewer. Lower left, oriented differently, the head shown from behind the right ear.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and black ink, brush and bistre wash, graphite on paper

label: Description
value: At right, the heads and necks of two grazing cows. Lower center, detail of the left eye and ear of a grazing cow. Upper left, two sketches, in graphite, of the back part of a cow with the udder, and the horns of a cow shown from the back. Center left, an eye and forehead of a cow, oriented differently. Upper center, the head and neck, probably of a steer. Lower left, detail with caption. Verso: Back views and details of cows. One sketch of the upper part of a hind leg. Six numbered designs in the center and in the lower left showing heads and parts of them, from the back. Place and date inscribed in ink above the center of the left edge.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and black ink, brush and bistre wash, graphite on paper

label: Description
value: Sail boat, upper left, and a large sailing ship, shown obliquely from the bow, left. A sail boat with three men, upper right, and a sail boat with two masts, lower right. Upper right, vertically, a seascape with mountains. Verso: A two master with lowered sails. The top of the higher mast is shown beside. At right, vertically, the stern of a ship with a big rudder. The ship's name is VENEZIA.
Study of a Standing Cow, Farmington

label: Description
value: A standing cow is slightly obliquely shown, directed toward left. A part of a building is shown as background, showing a narrow window at left, a door at right. Margins show the creamy grounding color.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint on canvas

label: Description
value: A grazing cow is obliquely shown from the left side. The head is turned toward the left. A part of a timber house with a low window is shown in the left background. Margins with the grounding color.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint on canvas

label: Description
value: A cow is shown in profile, on a meadow, walking toward right.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint on canvas
Head of a Cow or Ox

label: Description
value: The head of a cow or an ox shown slightly from above with foreshortened upper part of the body. Verso: in graphite, slight sketch of a decorated glass, surrounded by geometric lines.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, pen and ink, graphite on rough grey paper

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of two oak trees appearing in a hilly foreground, one on right gnarled and savaged by age in contrast to one on left which stands erect and in full bloom. In distance are additional trees indicated by hastily shaded forms.
Verso: Horizontal view of an enormous oak tree rising in central middle distance, in a vale between two wooded hillsides.  Bushes grow around it.  A road is shown in left foreground.

label: Physical description
value: Recto and verso: Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor and white gouache on gray-green wove paper

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor, graphite on light cardboard

label: Description
value: Two stems of a hop vine, with leaves and flowers. Upper left corner, study of a single leaf.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a goup of trees shown against a background of a wood.  High bottom margin.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and gouache on rough reddish-brown paper.

label: Description
value: Vertical view of a group of trees including the lower portion of an enormous trunk at right and a buttressed wall in the right background.  High bottom margin.

label: Physical description
value: Black crayon, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor on dark-gray colored paper.

label: Description
value: Study of the head and neck of a cock. Shown in profile, turned toward right.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor and gouache, graphite on cream wove paper

label: Description
value: Oblique view of a wagon, the wheels, the front part of the frame with the rear of the carriage pole elaborately shown.  The carriage body is slightly sketched.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and watercolor, gouache on cream wove paper

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle.  Oblique view of five wagons standing on grass. Blue sky.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint on cardboard
The Pine Trees of El Monte, California

label: Description
value: A group of pines is flanked by two pines at left, a row of pines at right. Bottom, inverse direction, pencil outline of a tree top.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor with white gouache on gray paper

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a covered wagon shown slightly obliquely from the right front corner.  The canvas cover is raised in the front part.  It is supported by four arches.  The body is low and oblong.  The driver's seat resting on springs rises from it.  Grass and sky are indicatec.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and gouache on rough gray paper.
Main Street, East Hampton, Long Island

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a road leading backwards, flanked by rows of trees. Houses and a carriage are shown at left, with a rider standing under a tree, in the right middle distance.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and yellow-green,gray, brown, and black washes with white gouache on gray paper.
